sentences.en: And I won't even dignify your navy bean suggestion.
sentences.cn: 还有,你那个关于菜豆的建议我是不会考虑的.

sentences.en: Don't try to dignify those few hairs on your face by calling them a beard!
sentences.cn: 别想把你脸上那几根毛说成是胡子来美化它!

sentences.en: I shall not dignify this insensitive remark with an answer.
sentences.cn: 我不会欣赏这种毫无亮点的回答.

sentences.en: I won't even dignify your navy bean suggestion.
sentences.cn: 对于你关于菜豆的建议,我不会予以答复.

sentences.en: I wouldn't dignify this trash by calling it a novel.
sentences.cn: 这部劣等作品我是不会美称为小说的.

sentences.en: It does not dignify the human condition. It does not elevate the human spirit.
sentences.cn: 它不能使人活得更有尊严, 不能提升人的精神生活.

sentences.en: Tragic literature dignifies sorrow and disaster.
sentences.cn: 悲剧性文学使悲伤和灾难显得尊贵。

sentences.en: We won't dignify this kind of speculation with a comment.
sentences.cn: 这种猜测不值得我们作任何评论。

words.tran_cn: 庄严的；有尊严的；高贵的

trans.tran_cn: 使有尊严，使崇高，使增辉，美化
trans.tran_en: To dignify something means to make it impressive

trans.tran_cn: 使有尊严， 使高贵； 美化
trans.tran_en: To dignify something means to make it impressive
